description:
"The Sphere II Long Sleeve Tee is a soft and versatile merino-blend tee that provides natural performance around the globe. Made with icebreaker's lightweight, moisture management and incredibly breathable Cool-Lite™ jersey fabric, the Sphere also features a drop-tail hem for added coverage and offset seams to reduce friction when carrying a pack.

Silky-soft merino and TENCEL®, sourced from responsible eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a luxurious fabric that naturally regulates your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. "
name: Icebreaker Sphere II LS Tee - Mens

specs.value: 60% Lyocell, 40% Merino Wool - Exclusive of decoration
